price: Na wanasema: Subhana Rabbina, Ametakasika Mola wetu Mlezi! Hakika ahadi ya Mola wetu Mlezi lazima itimizwe!.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِن كَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفۡعُولٗا
footnotes: Na wao husema: Mola wetu Mlezi ametakasika na ila ya kwenda kinyume na ahadi yake ya kuneemesha na kuadhibu alio ahidi. Kwani ahadi yake lazima itimie bila ya shaka yoyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna sub'ḥāna rabbinā in kāna waʿdu rabbinā lamafʿūlan
